description: A natural alternative to paraffin candles, for use in UCO candle lanterns. They're lead-free, soot-free, and have a light, sweet scent.Pure cotton wick.Burns up to 15 hours, when used in candle lantern.For use in UCO Original Candle Lantern, Candlelier Candle Lanterns or on their own.
name: UCO Beeswax Lantern Candle
